resources.string: Welcome to our NASA Earth Imagery Database Project!
Click Here to see the Earth
Enter the longitude and latitude below to see an image of the earth at those coordinates.

Error: Something went wrong with downloading the image. This is likely due to the coordinates you entered. Try entering coordinates between the acceptable range. It might also be due to a problem with the internet. Check the logs for more information.
Do you want to delete this?
The id of the database is:
Enter your name! I\'ll save it using shared preferences for later!
I\'ll remember that for next time!
